page.title: 06Nether Stowey:People at Work
page.content: As this is an agricultural area a number of people work on the land or with animals. Stowey Court Farm, making cheese and farm produce, offers employment. Nearby, the Poultry Packers is probably the biggest employer within our area,particularly for shift work.More work can be found in building, shops, pubs, some domestic employment, the Health Centre, Library, and School. A few people are involved in cottage industries. A large section of the community commute to Taunton, Bridgwater, Bristol, and countrywide. A few people work on contracts abroad.As is common nationwide at this time, there is a shortage of employment, which particularly affects young people.
